name: Fodiō
description:
Explore a seemingly abandoned cave section with your new spherical buddy and try to make your way up to the surface, or... dig deeper. 

Fodiō is a small metroidvania experience made for and during the Metroidvania Month 13 Jam.

This is the introductory section of the game and provides around 5-10 minutes of gameplay. 

Have fun!

[ MAY CONTAIN BUGS ]
